tests.title: Depression Assessment Test
tests.description: A comprehensive screening tool for depression symptoms
tests.detailedDescription: This test helps identify symptoms of depression and their severity. It uses standardized questions based on PHQ-9 to assess your emotional well-being over the past two weeks.

tests.title: Anxiety Screening Test
tests.detailedDescription: A screening tool based on GAD-7 designed to measure anxiety levels and identify potential anxiety disorders. The test evaluates both physical and psychological symptoms.

tests.title: Stress Level Assessment
tests.description: Evaluate your current stress levels and coping mechanisms
tests.detailedDescription: Based on the PSS (Perceived Stress Scale), this assessment helps identify your current stress levels and provides insights into your stress management capabilities.
